title: Light Flow - LED Control
summary: Take control of your notifications. LEDs, vibration, repeating sounds and more.
developerAddress:
First Floor,
Telecom House,
125-135 Preston Road,
Brighton,
England,
BN1 6AF
description: Light Flow allows you to take control of your notification on your device.It's main features are: - Controlling the notification LED for phones that have them (cycling colors through outstanding notifications) - Sound control, including repeating sounds - Vibration control, including custom vibration patterns and repeating vibrations - Android wear vibration support - Sleep times - Lock screen based notifications (on phones that support live wallpapers on lock screens) - Contact specific notifications for certain notification typesThis program will allow you to control the notification color for     * SMS messages,     * MMS messages,     * New Gmail messages    * New e-mails    * Calendar reminders    * Missed calls    * Low battery     * Bluethooth    * Google Talk notifications / Hangouts    * Handcent    * No signal    * SMS Popup    * ChompSMS    * K9 mail    * Silent modeYou can also set repeating sounds or vibration patterns for each notification type.It'll even push out notifications to your wearable deivces and pebble smart watch.It works on non-rooted phones and also allows the colors to flash in succession, so if you have a new SMS and a missed call it can alternate between the two colors. You can also set which notification type has the highest priority and let it flash in just that one color.Note that it will take over control of your notifications and you will therefore only get notifications for categories that the app allows.See our FAQ for more details:http://www.reactle.com/p/faq.htmlFor a full changelog see here:http://www.reactle.com/p/change-log.htmlFor a full list of permissions required and why see here:http://www.reactle.com/2014/06/app-permissions.htmlKnown issues/Limitations------------------------Not all phones support all colors or even have notification LED hardware in them. Some phones can only light up the notification while the screen is off.Some phones cannot have their notification light always onSome phones cannot have their notification blink and it will always be on★ Reboot your phone after an upgrade if having problems ★ For differences between the lite and full version see here: http://www.reactle.com/p/features.html
descriptionHTML:
Light Flow allows you to take control of your notification on your device.

It's main features are:
- Controlling the notification LED for phones that have them (cycling colors through outstanding notifications)
- Sound control, including repeating sounds
- Vibration control, including custom vibration patterns and repeating vibrations
- Android wear vibration support
- Sleep times
- Lock screen based notifications (on phones that support live wallpapers on lock screens)
- Contact specific notifications for certain notification types


This program will allow you to control the notification color for
* SMS messages,
* MMS messages,
* New Gmail messages
* New e-mails
* Calendar reminders
* Missed calls
* Low battery
* Bluethooth
* Google Talk notifications / Hangouts
* Handcent
* No signal
* SMS Popup
* ChompSMS
* K9 mail
* Silent mode

You can also set repeating sounds or vibration patterns for each notification type.


It'll even push out notifications to your wearable deivces and pebble smart watch.

It works on non-rooted phones and also allows the colors to flash in succession, so if you have a new SMS and a missed call it can alternate between the two colors. You can also set which notification type has the highest priority and let it flash in just that one color.

Note that it will take over control of your notifications and you will therefore only get notifications for categories that the app allows.


See our FAQ for more details:
http://www.reactle.com/p/faq.html

For a full changelog see here:
http://www.reactle.com/p/change-log.html

For a full list of permissions required and why see here:
http://www.reactle.com/2014/06/app-permissions.html

Known issues/Limitations
------------------------
Not all phones support all colors or even have notification LED hardware in them.

Some phones can only light up the notification while the screen is off.

Some phones cannot have their notification light always on

Some phones cannot have their notification blink and it will always be on


★ Reboot your phone after an upgrade if having problems

★ For differences between the lite and full version see here:
http://www.reactle.com/p/features.html
comments: I can't seem to get this app to work on the Huawei P10 plus. Help!  Thank you

Worked great on Android 7 and continues to work great on Android 8.0 (pixel xl).  This is an app I can't live without and I'm shocked Google hasn't built it into the OS after all these years.  Definitely worth buying the pro version or the license so the developer gets paid for their hard work.  It's well earned.

My Meizu M3 Note doesn't light the notification light when charging. This is annoying. I thought this app might be able to fix that. That's the only thing I tried because that's all I needed, and it didn't work, so I uninstalled.

When did you guys got so greedy. I appreciate a pro/licensed version for some features but everything that this app stands for is paid. Alright the price is low but some of us aren't using credit cards etc.

It was a brilliant idea that had alot going for it but then Instagram decided money was more important then humans sharing ideas and thoughts. Does the job until the next new idea comes along to then be imposed upon by capitalism.
recentChanges: * Fixed issue with sounds sometimes cutting off or stopping after a while
* Fixed issue where in the notification picker a sound wouldn't stop
